attributes.action: Freedom of choice for all unvaccinated healthcare workers
attributes.additional_details: The statistics show that vaccinated people are still getting and spreading the virus. Healthcare workers risked their lives through the pandemic and to now be told our jobs are at risk is completely unacceptable. We will make a stand and refuse to lose our jobs or our freedom of choice.
attributes.background:
All healthcare workers should be entitled to freedom of choice and not be forced to have a vaccine that is causing deaths. We will make a stand to keep our jobs, protect the nhs, people’s jobs and freedom of choice. 
All NHS and CQC companies should allow unvaccinated workers to continue practice.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996
